content: bottom to top each time catching a small amount of fabric very close to the centre point as you do so pull the yarn tail tightly to cinch in the centre of the pumpkin in to achieve the desired shape the tighter you pull the yarn tail flatter and fatter your pumpkin will become once you are happy with the shape sew in the ends and cut the yarn tails glue your stalk in place at the top of the pumpkin make some more for your own patch pumpkins copyright© helen kennedy 2024 this pattern may not be distributed pattern support helenkennedydesigns@gmail com
